description:
This is a basic introduction to aromatherapy and the use of essential oils for therapeutic purposes. It's designed with the absolute beginner in mind. If you've always wondered about aromatherapy, but have never studied it formally (or if it's been a very long time since you have) then this course is for you!

The topics covered are:

  • What is Aromatherapy?
  • History of Aromatherapy
  • Current Trends
  • Distillation, Extraction and Storage
  • Safe Use, Cautions and Contraindications
  • Overview of benefits
  • Base Oils and Products
  • Further Study

This aromatherapy course is not affiliated with any products company or multi-level marketing scheme. It is purely educational. You do not need to purchase anything to go through this course, although if you already have a few essential oils on hand to sniff and examine during the lectures, that's great!

You should complete this course before moving on to more advanced topics such as blending and aromatherapy treatment design. This course is more conceptual than a workshop would be. It will give you the knowledge you need to jumpstart your aromatherapy practice and confidence to begin using essential oils.
title: Aromatherapy Basics
